title: Is Prehistoric Anivia too small?
body: I've seen prehistoric anivia in maybe 2 games now, and it seems like her model is much smaller than regular anivia.  Is it actually smaller?

replies.body: It's not smaller, although the wings are thinner and the overall design is a lot less bulky. I'd still like to see it scaled up a bit in the future, but there are game play concerns if she gets too much bigger.
vlad has a skin that makes him much smaller
